message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done my research and I believe that's a fair price for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your perspective, but $8,000 significantly undervalues the product's capabilities.  I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This is a very fair offer considering the value it will bring to you.

I understand that the product has great capabilities, but I still think $19,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually agreeable price.
Bob, I appreciate you meeting me a bit.  I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while still offering you a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from the price I'm comfortable with. I'll offer $12,000 this time. I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
